Item ID12610

The Book of law is a book held in place of a shield, and is the God book aligned with Armadyl. Its incomplete/damaged form can be purchased from Jossik for 5,000 coins after completing Horror from the Deep. Books of law must subsequently be filled using all four torn Armadyl pages which can be purchased from other players, or obtained from Treasure Trails.

Equipping a book of law allows the player to preach and perform ceremonies, such as blessing, last rites, and wedding rites, by operating it (none of which have any effect on the game itself, and are simply recited lines of text), costing 25% of the player's special attack energy.

Lost books of law can be reclaimed by speaking to Jossik, complete with all pages that have been added, for no cost. Alternatively, for those who do not wish to travel to the Lighthouse, Perdu will return them to players for 14,000 coins.

The completed book has the fourth highest ranged bonus of all off-hand items, following just behind the odium ward.

The Book of Law counts as an Armadyl item for the God Wars Dungeon.

Filling the Book of law currently costs 103,532 coins when buying each page individually or 127,082 when buying the item set.

Transcript[edit | edit source]

Wedding Rites[edit | edit source]

  • As ye vow to be at peace with each other... And to uphold high values of morality and friendship... I now pronounce you united in the law of Armadyl.

Last Rites[edit | edit source]

  • Thou didst fight true... but the foe was too great. May thy return be as swift as the flight of Armadyl.

Blessings[edit | edit source]

  • For thy task is lawful... May the blessing of Armadyl be upon thee.

Preach[edit | edit source]

  • Peace shall bring thee wisdom; Wisdom shall bring thee peace. This is the law of Armadyl.

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Tier Emotes STASH Location Items Cost
Elite Bow South-east corner of the Edgeville Monastery, on the ground floor 103,532[c 1]
  1. ↑ The cost may be higher because of the variant of the item used. The base item is god book.

[[File:Book of law detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Book of law''' is a book held in place of a [[shield]], and is the [[God book]] aligned with [[Armadyl]]. Its incomplete/damaged form can be purchased from [[Jossik]] for 5,000 coins after completing [[Horror from the Deep]]. Books of law must subsequently be filled using all four torn [[Armadyl page]]s which can be purchased from other players, or obtained from [[Treasure Trails]].

Equipping a book of law allows the player to preach and perform ceremonies, such as blessing, last rites, and wedding rites, by operating it (none of which have any effect on the game itself, and are simply recited lines of text), costing 25% of the player's [[special attack]] energy.

Lost books of law can be reclaimed by speaking to [[Jossik]], complete with all pages that have been added, for no cost. Alternatively, for those who do not wish to travel to the [[Lighthouse]], [[Perdu]] will return them to players for 14,000 [[coins]].

The completed book has the fourth highest [[ranged]] bonus of all off-hand items, following just behind the [[odium ward]].

The Book of Law counts as an Armadyl item for the [[God Wars Dungeon]].

'''Filling the Book of law currently costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Armadyl page 1}} + {{GEP|Armadyl page 2}} + {{GEP|Armadyl page 3}} + {{GEP|Armadyl page 4}}}} coins when buying each page individually or {{Coins|{{GEP|Book of law page set}}}} when buying the [[Book of law page set|item set]].'''
